pageProduct.name: Reef Coconut Shimmer Oil Bronze Glow SPF15 125ml
pageProduct.description:
Information

About Reef Oils

Originally launched in the 1970's, Reef is one of Australia's most iconic sun care brands, known for its famous coconut scented oils and carefree, fun nature. Reef now offers a range of suncare products infused with our signature coconut scent, from Sun Tan Oils, Sunscreen Oils to Sunscreen Lotions!

Reef Oil Range

Reef is Australia's leading* sunscreen oil brand.

Reef complies with the Hawaii Reef Bill to help care for our coral reefs.

Reef is proudly Australian made for the Australian Sun.

Scented with the smell of summer - Reef's delicious signature coconut fragrance.

Now with a range of HIGH SPF PRODUCTS.

The ultra-moisturising oil formulations glide on, are fast drying, and absorb quickly, leaving skin feeling hydrated, soft and supple.

The entire Reef range is formulated to be free from oxybenzone and other ingredients excluded under the current Hawaii Reef Bill.

All Reef products are formulated using cruelty free ingredients.

*Australia Grocery Pharmacy Dollars (000s) MAT 04/07/21

General Information

Reef Coconut Shimmer Sun Tan Oil Bronze Glow SPF 15 gives you a beautiful poolside glow.

Reef Coconut Shimmer Sun Tan Oil SPF 15 is blended with light-reflecting mica minerals for a beautiful sun-kissed glow. Scented with Reef's signature coconut fragrance, this ultra-moisturising oil formulation glides on, is fast drying, and absorbs quickly to leave skin feeling hydrated, soft and supple.

Product Claims: Cruelty free

Size: 125mL

Scent: Coconut

SPF: 15

Ingredients

Paraffinum Liquidum, Homosalate, Isopropyl Myristate, Cocos Nucifera Oil, Silica, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Octocrylene, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis Oil, Mica, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Parfum, CI 77491, Titanium Dioxide, CI 77499, BHT, Propylparaben.

Directions

Shake well before use.
Apply liberally and evenly to all unprotected areas 15 to 20 minutes before exposure to the sun. Re-apply every 1-2 hours or more frequently after swimming, toweling or exercise. If rash or irritation occurs, discontinue use. For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes.

USAGE ADVICE

Sun Safety: Avoid prolonged exposure to the sun. Always wear a hat, protective clothing and sunglasses. Never expose babies under six months to the sun. For external use only. Keep out of eyes. Avoid contact with fabrics. Do not use on broken or damaged skin.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C.

Storage Temperature: Below 30°C.
